version_description:
iOS7 ready.

Periodic table improved. Higher oxides appears in it. Separation for primary and secondary subgroups added.
Chemical reactions indexes displayed nicely.

Fixed bug with 3G.

Energy consumption reduced.

• Periodic table Fixed
• Solubility table improved for iPad (iOS 7.0 and above)

Image loading improved
App works better for iPad
Periodic table for Apple Watch
Small enhancements
Small fixes and improvements

• Solubility table fixed: Co3 changed to CO3.
• Periodic table enhanced: some atom mass values are more accurate now.
• Stumbled upon a bug or just wanna say hi — contact us right from the app.

• Swipe reaction to the left to share it with friends.
• Use enhanced keyboard to search chemical reactions.
Chemical elements names updated: Nihonium, Moscovium, Tennessine, Oganesson.
iPhone X support
App stability is improved
iPad crash fixed
* Some improvements in Periodic Table
* Periodic Table supports 3D touch
Some localizations improvements

* Text input helper has been added for search requests and molar mass calculator.
* Number keyboard was fixed for devices with tiny screens.
* "Sodium" has been changed to "Bicarbonate" in solubility table.

* Chemical reactions search quality improved.
* Dynamic fonts support improved on tables list screen.
* Some unexpected characters like "(,.)" removed from search results.

* New Apple Watch support
* Background color fixed for chemical elements Nh, Mc, Ts, Og on Apple Watch
* Fixed crash for the search term "="

* Periodic table can be zoomed
* Accessibility VoiceOver support added to Periodic Table
* Electronegativity table values have been updated
* New table added: Acid strength chart
* Periodic Table supports 3D touch
* Periodic Table supports 3D touch
* Some improvements in Periodic Table
* Some improvements in Periodic Table
* Some improvements in Periodic Table

* Design of Molar Mass calculator has improved
* Reactions search screen design has improved for iPad
* Small performance improvements

* Top-requested feature. Supporting horizontal orientation. You can use the Periodic table and all the other tables when the phone is rotated horizontally
* Molar mass calculator shows a description of supported format - easier to use when you first see the calculator.
* Removing Google Analytics to improve the battery life

* Top-requested feature. Supporting horizontal orientation. You can use the Periodic table and all the other tables when the phone is rotated horizontally
* Molar mass calculator shows a description of supported format - easier to use when you first see the calculator.
* Removing Google Analytics to improve the battery life

* Facebook Analytics removed
* Widgets crash fixed
* Molar mass calculator interface improved
* Reactions search shows errors when reaction is not found

Do you like the Chemistry application? Please, spend a couple of seconds to rate the app

* Salts of oxalic acid added to solubility table
* Molar mass calculator interface improved

Do you like the Chemistry application? Please, spend a couple of seconds to rate the app

* 3D Bohr model
* Molar mass calcualtor usage history

Do you like the Chemistry application? Please, spend a couple of seconds to rate the app
